attributes.action: request parliament to enact a law that would rescind all laws that had been enacted as a result of an e-petition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Laws (and law makers) should not be influenced by a frivolous e-petitions created in minutes and requiring little or no effort.
E-petitions are nothing more than a gimmick and have no place in the government of this country.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
